import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; class SectionAde extends Component { render () { let result = []; for (let i=1; i<=lastDay; i++) { result.push(
{[i]}
{dayOfWeek}
); } return (
XXXX年XX月XX日 課名
開始時刻 終了時刻
{result}
課名 出欠
); } } export default SectionAde;
